headline: Can NIKE’s (NKE) Latest Golf Collaboration Reveal Its Next Move in Lifestyle Brand Expansion?
summary: Eastside Golf recently announced the launch of its second "Take Flight" footwear collection in collaboration with NIKE, featuring new performance and lifestyle golf shoes available online and at select retailers from late September to early October, alongside a New York City pop-up event to showcase the full range. This partnership highlights NIKE's ongoing efforts to broaden its appeal within golf and lifestyle segments by connecting with new audiences through culturally relevant and...

headline: Nike's 2025 Comeback: How the Sneaker Stock Is Approaching Break-Even
summary: There’s optimism behind Nike's shares that has some analysts looking toward triple-digit prices for the stock for the first time since March 2024.

raw.headline: Nike's 2025 Comeback: How the Sneaker Stock Is Approaching Break-Even
raw.summary: There’s optimism behind Nike's shares that has some analysts looking toward triple-digit prices for the stock for the first time since March 2024.

headline: Britain's JD Sports says Nike 'doing all the right things' to lift sales
summary: LONDON (Reuters) -Nike's new CEO Elliott Hill got a vote of confidence from one of its largest customers, British sportswear retailer JD Sports, whose finance chief said Nike was "doing all the right things" to revive demand.  Hill, who was with Nike for more than three decades, returned as CEO in October to lead a turnaround at the firm which had been struggling with strategy missteps that soured its relations with retailers.  Under Hill, Nike has been investing in its running shoe and sneaker lines to reclaim lost ground in the segments, while rekindling relationships with retailers.
